venue.name: Moishe House Boston: Kavod Jewish Social Justice House

item.description: Honorable Menschen, Boston’s post-collegiate Jewish acapella group will be holding auditions for all voice parts on Sunday, October 14th at Moishe Kavod House, 165 Winthrop Road, Brookline from 4:00-9:00 pm. If you like to sing Jewish music, have fun and perform around the Greater Boston area, this is the group for you. Auditions are by appointment only. To sign up for an audition slot, email auditions@honorablemenschen.org – or check out their website: www.honorablemenschen.org.
item.name: Honorable Menschen Auditions
